src: అతను కాలేజీకి చెల్లించడానికి బేబీ సిటింగ్ ముగించాడు.
mt: He finished his baby sitting to pay for college.
ref: He ended up babysitting to pay for college.

src: టెడ్ ఒక సంవత్సరం తరువాత కౌంటీ మేజిస్ట్రేట్ కోసం పోటీ చేయాలని నిర్ణయించుకున్నాడు.
mt: Ted has decided to run for County Magistrate next year.
ref: Ted decided to run for county magistrate a year later.

src: తదుపరిసారి ఆమెకు బంతి వచ్చినప్పుడు ఆమె దానితో మరింత జాగ్రత్తగా ఉండేది.
mt: Subsequently, she was more careful when a ball came her way.
ref: Next time she got a ball she was more careful with it.

src: మామా చేసిన అపారమైన ఆదరణకు మేము కృతజ్ఞతలు తెలిపాము.
mt: We thank you for your immense support.
ref: We thanked Mama for her huge favor.

mt: Bob forgot his boots, too.
ref: Bob had also forgotten his shoes.

mt: Carl had decided to get rid of his old bike.
ref: Carl decided to throw the old bike away.

src: ఆమె కడుపుని శాంతపరచడానికి నెమ్మదిగా ఒక గ్లాసు నీరు తాగింది.
mt: She slowly drank a glass of water to calm her stomach.
ref: She slowly drank a glass of water to calm her stomach.

mt: Carl was then a dead man.
ref: Carl then became a garbage man.

mt: She thanked Julie Barry for her help.
ref: Julie gave Barry a hug and thanked him.

mt: James was worried about what he had done.
ref: James was ashamed of what he had done.

src: అప్పటి నుండి, నేను ప్రయాణ సమయాన్ని పుష్కలంగా వదిలివేసేలా చూసుకున్నాను.
mt: I have been trying to make the most of my time since then.
ref: From then on, I made sure to leave myself plenty of travel time.

mt: The teacher joined in the conversation.
ref: The teacher joined their conversation.

src: డేనియల్ కిచెన్ లైట్ ఆన్ చేసి, అల్పాహారం తీసుకున్నాడు.
mt: Daniel Kitchin turned on the light and took a snack.
ref: Daniel turned on the kitchen light and had a snack.

mt: I talked to an officer and was pleased.
ref: I enjoyed talking to the officer.

src: మెలిస్సా తల్లి తన కొడుకును తరువాత పడుకోమని సూచించింది.
mt: Melissa's mother suggested her son lie down afterwards.
ref: Melissa's mother suggested putting her son to bed later.

src: మార్క్ ప్రసిద్ధి చెందాడు మరియు చాలా డబ్బు సంపాదించాడు.
mt: Mark became famous and made a lot of money.
ref: Mark became famous and made a lot of money.

src: రెక్స్ అర్జెంటీనాకు తిరిగి రానని ప్రతిజ్ఞ చేశాడు.
mt: He vowed to return to Argentina.
ref: Rex vows never to return to Argentina.

src: అతను దానిని ఖాళీ పొలానికి తీసుకెళ్లి దహనం చేశాడు.
mt: He took it to an empty field and burned it.
ref: He then took it to an empty field and burned it.

mt: They had never used the tank before.
ref: They never used the tank.

src: వెచ్చని పానీయాలు ఉన్నప్పటికీ వారు అద్భుతమైన పిక్నిక్ చేసారు.
mt: Despite the warm drinks, they had an amazing picnic.
ref: They had a wonderful picnic, despite the warm drinks.

src: తాబేలు కొనడానికి ఆమె తల్లిదండ్రులు నిరాకరించడంతో సండ్ర బాధపడింది.
mt: Her parents refused to let her buy a tab, so Sandra was upset.
ref: Sandra was upset that her parents refused to buy her a turtle.

mt: Children have decided to play marbles.
ref: The children decided to play marbles.

mt: Francisco Plumber died.
ref: Francisco became a plumber.

mt: She then threw the pins into the trash.
ref: Then she threw the pinecones in the garbage.

mt: The restaurant was very cold.
ref: The restaurant was just too cold.
Betsy likes cheeseburgers.

mt: Their baby looked like both of them.
ref: Their child looked like both of them.

src: గినా టీచర్ ఏమాత్రం మోసపోలేదు మరియు ఆమెకు మరింత నిర్బంధాన్ని ఇచ్చింది.
mt: The teacher did not lie and was given more restrictions.
ref: Gina's teacher wasn't fooled at all and gave her more detention.

mt: Gil Dhyanan stopped meditating.
ref: Jill stopped meditating.

src: మరియు ఆమె చూసిన అతిపెద్ద ఎలుగుబంటిని చూసింది.
mt: And she saw the biggest bat she had ever seen.
ref: And saw the biggest bear she had ever seen.

mt: Sara smiled broadly.
ref: Sara laughed hysterically.

src: కనెక్టికట్‌లో వచ్చిన ఉద్యోగాన్ని తీసుకుని ఉండాల్సింది అని కూడా ప్యాట్ ఆలోచిస్తుంటాడు.
mt: He also says he is considering taking a job in Connecticut.
ref: Pat also thinks he should have taken a job in Connecticut.

src: టాడ్ తన హాకీ గేమ్ కోసం ఒక సిల్లీ డ్రెస్ ధరించాడు.
mt: Todd wore a sleeveless dress for his hockey game.
ref: Todd wore a silly costume to his hockey game.

src: జోన్ తన రూమ్‌మేట్ చాలా శ్రద్ధగా ఉన్నందుకు కృతజ్ఞతలు.
mt: Zone thanks her roommate for being very careful.
ref: Joan was thankful that her roommate was so caring.

mt: He went to the Peet Baseball Stadium.
ref: Pete went to the baseball stadium.

src: వార్మ్ జాకెట్ ఉండి ఉంటే బాగుంటుందని ఆమె భావించింది.
mt: She thought it would be better with a warm jacket.
ref: Clare wished she brought a warm jacket.

mt: She has enough money to dress herself.
ref: She earned enough to buy the dress.

src: వారు నిశ్శబ్దంగా కూడా కొంత సమయం హాయిగా నడిచారు.
mt: They were able to drive for some time without making a sound.
ref: They just walked comfortably in silence for a while.

mt: He went to help Harry, but didn't.
ref: Harry decided not to help and walked away.

src: ఇతరులకు సహాయం చేయడం నాకు ఇష్టం లేదు.
mt: I don't like helping others.
ref: I do not enjoy helping people.

src: కెవిన్ ఆమెకు ధన్యవాదాలు చెప్పాడు, వారు పార్క్‌లో సరదాగా గడిపారు.
mt: Kevin thanked her, and they spent some time in the park.
ref: Kevin thanked Stacy and they enjoyed their time at the park.

mt: However, Glen called his aunt a bitch.
ref: However, Glen hugs his mother-in-law.

src: వచ్చే వారం అంతా పూర్తయ్యాక ఆమె విశ్రాంతి తీసుకుంటుంది.
mt: She will take a break after the week's events.
ref: Next week she would relax when it was all over.

src: మేము బదులుగా ఇంటికి తిరిగి రావాలని నిర్ణయించుకున్నాము.
mt: We have decided to return home instead.
ref: We decided to return home instead.

src: హత్యలను పరిష్కరించడంలో ఆమె చేసిన ప్రయత్నాలు అంతగా సఫలం కాలేదు.
mt: Her efforts to reduce the number of murders were not entirely successful.
ref: Her attempts at solving murders, however, were less successful.

src: చాడ్ తన కోచ్‌ను సలహా అడిగిన తర్వాత టచ్‌డౌన్ సాధించాడు.
mt: Chad asked his coach for advice before winning the Touchdown.
ref: Chad scored a touchdown after asking his coach for advice.

src: అతని మోసం చేసిన భార్య పోలీసులను పిలిచింది మరియు అతన్ని అరెస్టు చేశారు.
mt: His wife called the police and had him arrested.
ref: His cheating wife called the police and he was arrested.

src: ఇవాన్ తన తదుపరి పాదయాత్ర కోసం దోమల వికర్షకాన్ని కొనుగోలు చేశాడు.
mt: Ivan bought a mosquito net for his next camping trip.
ref: Ivan bought mosquito repellent for his next hike.

src: వారి మద్దతు కోసం పైగే తన స్నేహితులపై ఆధారపడవలసి వచ్చింది.
mt: He said he had to rely on his friends for support.
ref: Paige had to rely on her friends for their support.

mt: John was pleased to have her back on the date.
ref: John was glad he asked her on a date.

mt: The sound of the explosion was amazing.
ref: The flute sounded beautiful.

mt: The ride was enjoyed by many.
ref: The ride was very fun for Maggie.
